name: PKAddPassesViewController
desc: Lets your app show a pass and prompt the user to add that pass to the pass library.

items.name: class func canAddPasses() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the device supports adding passes.

items.name: protocol PKAddPassesViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: Methods that an add-passes view controller’s delegate implements.

items.name: init?(pass: PKPass)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a newly created add-passes view controller with a single pass.

items.name: init?(passes: [PKPass])
items.desc: Initializes and returns a newly created add-passes view controller with an array of passes.
